entry.title: WIND WARNING , Umiujaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:31 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Umiujaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:54 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Umiujaq Airport 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -8.3°C
Pressure: 99.5 kPa
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -13.3°C
Wind: E 95 km/h gust 116 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northeast 90 km/h gusting to 120 diminishing to 70 gusting to 100 near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow overnight. Wind northeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming east 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
